toolDisplayName: Creating Energy in Body and Mind

toolData.sleepDoWell: I go to bed at the same time every night
toolData.sleepNotDoWell: I check my phone right before sleeping
toolData.sleepKeyHabit: Put phone in living room 1 hour before bed
toolData.sleepRoutine: 1. Alarm goes off 2. Put phone on charger in living room 3. Read book for 15 min
toolData.sleepAccountabilityPartner: My spouse - check in every morning
toolData.foodNotDoWell: Too much sugar in the afternoon
toolData.foodRoutine: 1. Go to grocery store 2. Wash and cut vegetables 3. Put in containers in fridge
toolData.foodAccountabilityPartner: Share progress in team Slack weekly
toolData.movementDoWell: I take stairs instead of elevator
toolData.movementNotDoWell: Sit for 8 hours straight without breaks
toolData.movementRoutine: 1. Put on sneakers 2. Walk around block 3. Track in Apple Health
toolData.brainDoWell: I block time for deep work
toolData.brainKeyHabit: Turn off Slack during deep work blocks
toolData.brainRoutine: 1. Close Slack 2. Put phone on airplane mode 3. Work on ONE task only
toolData.mentalCanControl: My reactions, my schedule, my habits, my focus
toolData.mentalCannotControl: Other people's opinions, market conditions, weather
toolData.eventDescription: My coworker criticized my presentation in front of the team
toolData.gapAnalysis: I felt angry and defensive. Wanted to argue back immediately.
toolData.idealResponse: Thank them for feedback, ask for specific suggestions, stay calm
toolData.futurePlan: Take 3 deep breaths before responding to criticism. Ask clarifying questions.
